Method Detail

startAnalysis

Model[] startAnalysis(ApplicationOptions options)
Starts the analysis of the alignment having the application options given in the command line. It will also print results as given in the application options.

Parameters:
options - the execution options
Returns:
set of optimized models

printModelsSorted

void printModelsSorted(InformationCriterion informationCriterion)
Prints the models sorted according to the selected information criterion.

Parameters:
informationCriterion - the information criterion to sort the models

computeInformationCriterion

SelectionChunk computeInformationCriterion(pal.alignment.Alignment alignment,
                                           Model[] models,
                                           int criterion,
                                           double confidenceInterval)
Calculates a Information Criterion wrapped into a Selection chunk object, which is a value-object

Parameters:
alignment - the alignment.
models - the optimized models .
criterion - the Information Criterion Constant.
confidenceInterval - the confidence interval.
